markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reflect Foe](/Feats.aspx?ID=3806) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Reflection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=431" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 121</row>

</column>

---

You create a copy of a foe by calling them forth from a nearby reflection, clonally growing them in an instant from one of your hairs or otherwise creating them in a way that matches your own nature as a reflection. You can cast [_duplicate foe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=93) once per day as an innate occult spell. At 20th level, your innate duplicate foe is heightened to 8th level.
name: Reflect Foe
